juzs.text: 41|47|Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:“Nimen wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yige ren neng zuozheng zhe jian shi.”
41|48|Tamen shengqian suo qidao de, jiang huibi tamen, tamen jiang quexin ziji wu suo tao zui.
41|49|Ren qifu bu yan, yi zao huohuan jiu huixin juewang.

41|50|Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo:“Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo buxin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou.” Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa.
41|51|Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta wang'en er zi da; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta qidao bu jue.
41|52|Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong an la nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta, name, you shei bi changyuan weibei zhenli zhe geng mi wu ne?”
41|53|Wo jiang zai sifang he zai tamen zishen zhong, ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu neng jianzheng wanwu hai bugou ma?
41|54|Zhen de, tamen dique huaiyi jianglai shifou yu tamen de zhu huimian. Zhen de, ta que shi zhouzhi wanwu de.
42|1|Ha yi, mi mu.
42|2|A ni, xi ni, ga fu.
42|3|Wanneng de, zhi rui de an la, zheyang qishi ni he ni yiqian de zhong xianzhi.
42|4|Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de; ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi da de.
42|5|Zhu tianti jihu cong shangmian polie, zhong tianshi zansong tamen de zhu, bing wei dimian shang de ren qiurao. Zhen de, an la que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
42|6|She an la er ze qu baohu zhe de ren, an la shi jianshi tamen de, ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe.

42|7|Wo zheyang qishi ni yi ben alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao shou yi ji qi sizhou de jumin, yibian ni yugao hao wuyi yi de jihe ri. Yibufen ren jiang zai leyuan zhong, yibufen ren jiang zai liehuo zhong.
42|8|Jiaruo an la yiyu, ta bi shi tamen xinfeng tongyi zongjiao, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe ru yu ta de enhui zhong; bu yi de renmen, jue wu baohu zhe, ye wu yuanzhu zhe.
42|9|Tamen zenme she ta er ze qu bie de baohu zhe ne? An la cai shi baohu zhe, ta neng shi sizhe fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de.
42|10|Wulun nimen zhenglun shenme shi, dou yao gui an la panjue. Na shi an la, shi wo de zhu, wo zhi tuo kao ta, wo zhi guiyi ta.

42|11|Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta yi nimen de tonglei wei nimen de qizi; shi nimen de shengchu tonglei xiangpei; ta jie ci shi nimen fanzhi. Renhe wu dou bushi xiang ta. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de.
42|12|Tiandi de baozang, zhishi ta de; ta yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo; ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.

42|13|Ta yi wei nimen zhiding zhengjiao, jiushi tasuo mingling nu ha de, tasuo qishi ni de, ta mingling yi bo la xin, mu sa he er sa de zongjiao. Nimen yingdang jin shouzhengjiao, buyao wei zhengjiao er fen men bie hu. Yi wu pei zhu de renmen, yiwei ni suo jiaodao tamen de shi shi nankan di. An la jiang tasuo yiyu zhe zhaozhi yu zheng jiao, jiang guiyi ta zhe yindao yu zhenli.

42|14|Zhishi lailin tamen zhihou, tamen cai wei huxiang jidu er fen paibie. Jiaruo bu shi yinwei ni de zhu yi yuxian shuoguo yao yanqi chengzhi, name, tamen bi yi shou caipanle. Zai tamen zhihou jicheng tian jing de renmen, duiyu tian jing, dique zai shi ren youyu de yihuo zhong.

42|15|Ni yingdang zhao ren yu ci dao, ni yingdang jin zun tianming, chang shou zhengdao, buyao shuncong tamen de siyu. Ni shuo:“Wo quexin an la suo jiang shi de jingdian, wo fengming gongping daiyu nimen. An la shi women de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu. Women you women de gongzuo, nimen you nimen de gongzuo, women bubi he nimen bianbo. An la jiang jihe women, ta shi weiyi de guisu.”
42|16|Zhongren ji ying zhao er xinfeng an la de zongjiao hou, wei ta er bianbo zhe, ju tamen de zhu kan lai, tamen de zhengju shi wuxiao de, tamen yingdang zao qian nu, bing shou yanxing.
42|17|An la jiang shi baohan zhenli de jingdian, bing jiang shi gongping. Ni zenme neng zhidao ne? Fuhuo shi huoxu shi linjin de.

42|18|Buxin fuhuo shi de renmen yaoqiu ta zaori shixian; er quexin ta de renmen que pa ta zaori shixian, bingqie zhidao ta shi zhenshi de. Zhen de, wei fuhuo shi'er zhengbian de renmen, dique zai bu jin qingli de mi wu zhi zhong.
42|19|An la shi ci'ai ta de zhong pu de, ta gongji tasuo yiyu gongji de ren, ta que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de.
42|20|Shei yu de houshi de shouhuo, wo jiu jia zeng shei de shouhuo; shei yu de jinshi de shouhuo, wo jiu gei shei yidian jinshi de shouhuo; ta zai houshi, meiyou fen er.
42|21|Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu, ceng wei tamen zhiding an la suo wei xuke de zongjiao ma? Jiaruo meiyou na pan ci, tamen bi shou panjue, bu yi de renmen, bi shou tongku de xingfa.

42|22|Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi de renmen wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er kongju, naxie zui'e de chengfa biding lailin tamen. Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jianglai yao juzhu zai leyuan de shengdi zhong, zai tamen de zhu nali, tamen de xiangshou tamen suo yu xiangshou de; na que shi hong en.

42|23|Na shi an la yong lai xiang ta naxie xindao erqie xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu baochou, dan qiu wei tongzu er qin'ai.” Shei xing yi jian shanshi, wo yao jiabei di baochou shei. An la que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de.
42|24|Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta jiajie an la de mingyi er niezao.” Ruguo an la yiyu, ta jiu fengbi ni de xin. An la yi qi wenci mosha xuwei, zhengshi zhenli, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de.
42|25|Ta zhunxu ta de zhong pu huiguo, ta raoshu yiqie zui'e, ta zhidao nimen de xingwei.
42|26|Ta daying xindao erqie xingshan zhe de qidao, ta yi endian jia ci tamen. Bu xindao zhe jiang shou yanli de xingfa.

42|27|Ruguo an la shi ta de pu renmen de xiangshou kuanyu de jiyang, tamen bi zai da dishang zuo'e; dan ta yi dingliang er jiangxia tasuo yu jiang de jiyang. Ta duiyu ta de pu renmen, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.
42|28|Ta zai tamen juewang zhihou, jiangxia shi yu, guang shile ta de enhui, ta que shi baohu zhe, que shi ke song de.
42|29|Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi chuangzao tiandi he ta zai tiandi jian suo sanbu de ge zhong dongwu, ta neng ziyou de jiang tamen jihe zai yiqi.
42|30|Fan nimen suo zaoyu de zainan, dou shi youyu nimen suozuo de zui'e; ta raoshu nimen de xuduo zuiguo.
42|31|Nimen zai da dishang jue buneng taobi tianqian, chu an la wai, nimen meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe.
42|32|Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi zai haizhong xiang shanyue yiban de chuanbo.
42|33|Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiu shi feng jingzhi, er chuanbo tingdun zai haimian shang. Duiyu mei ge jianren zhe, ganxie zhe, qizhong que you xuduo jixiang.
42|34|Ta huo yin tamen suozuo de zui'e, er shi naxie chuanbo chenmo; ta raoshu xuduo ren de zuiguo.
42|35|Wei wo de jixiang er zhenglun de renmen, zhidao tamen ziji jue wu chu tao zui.
42|36|Fan nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de xiangshou. Zai an la nali de baochou, shi geng youmei de, shi geng changjiu de, na shi guiyu xindao er zhi tuo kao an la zhe;
42|37|ye guiyu yuanli dazui he choushi, qie zai fanu shi neng she you zhe;
42|38|Ye guiyu yingda zhu de haozhao, qie jin shou bai gong zhe; tamen de shiwu, shi you xieshang er jueding de, tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de;
42|39|ye guiyu neng fankang ziji suo zaoyu de qinhai zhe.
42|40|E xing ying de tongyang de e bao. Shei yuan raoshu erqie hejie, an la bi baochou shei. An la que shi bu xi'ai bu yi zhe de.
42|41|Shou ren qiwu er jinxing baofu de renmen, shi wu ke zebei de.
42|42|Ying shou zebei de, shi qiwu taren, bingqie zai difang shang manheng wuli zhe; zhexie ren jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
42|43|Fan neng renshou er jiayi she you zhe, tamen di na zhong xingwei, que shi yinggai juexin zuo de shiqing.
42|44|An la shi shei mi wu, zai an la de qi juehou, shei meiyou renhe baohu zhe. Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi zhe yanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Hai you fanhui (chenshi) de tujing ma?”

42|45|Ni jianglai yao kanjian tamen shen lin huo yu, yin beijian er gongjing, anzhong tou kan. Xindao zhe jiang shuo:“Kui she de renmen, zai fuhuo ri que shi sangshi zishen he jiashu de.” Zhen de, bu yi zhe bi zai yongheng de xingfa zhong.
42|46|Chu an la wai, tamen jiang meiyou renhe pengyou yuanzhu tamen. An la shi shei mi wu, shei jiu meiyou daolu.
42|47|Zai buke kangju zhi ri, cong an la jianglin yiqian, nimen yingdang daying nimen de zhu. Zai na ri nimen jue meiyou taobi di difang, ye jue buneng dilai.

42|48|Ruguo tamen tuibi, name, wo meiyou pai ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe, ni zhi fu tongzhi de zeren. Wo shi renlei changshi cong wo fachu de enhui de shihou, tamen yin enhui er kuaile; tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui er zaonan de shihou, renlei que shi gu en de.
42|49|Tiandi de zhuquan, gui an la suoyou. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu gei shei nuhai, jiu gei shei nuhai; yu gei shei nanhai, jiu gei shei nanhai;
42|50|huo shi tamen jian sheng nanhai he nuhai; ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe chengwei buneng shengyu de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de.

42|51|Renhe ren ye bupei yu an la duihua, chufei qishi, huo cong weimu de houmian, huo pai yige shizhe, feng ta de mingling er qishi tasuo yu qishi de. Ta que shi zhigaowushang de, que shi zhi rui de.

42|52|Wo zheyang qishi ni cong wo de mingling zhong fachu de jingshen. Ni benlai bu zhidao tian jing shi shenme, zhengxin shi shenme; dan wo yi tian jing wei guangming, er jie ci guangming yindao wo suo yu yindao de puren. Ni que shi zhishi zhenglu zhe.
42|53|Na shi an la de lu. Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Zhen de, wanshi zhi gui an la.
43|1|Ha yi, mi mu.
43|2|Yi mingbai de jingdian mengshi,
43|3|wo que yi yi ci wei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian nimen liaojie.
43|4|Zai wo nali de tian jing yuanben zhong, ta que shi gaoshang de, que shi ruizhi de.
43|5|Nandao yinwei nimen shi guofen de minzhong, wo jiu shi nimen bude shou jiaoxun ma?
43|6|Wo ceng paiqian xuduo xianzhi qu jiaohua gudai de minzu,
43|7|mei ge xianzhi lailin tamen de shihou, tamen dou jiayi yunong.
43|8|Wo ceng huimiele bi ni de zongzu geng qiangheng zhe, xian min de shili yi shiqule.
43|9|Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“Wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu chuangzaole tiandi.”
43|10|Ta yi dadi wei nimen de anxi zhi suo, ta wei nimen zai da dishang kaipi xuduo daolu, yibian nimen dadao luxing de mudi de.
43|11|Ta cong tianshang jiangxia you dingliang de yushui, jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Nimen jianglai yao zheyang cong fenmu zhong bei quchu.
43|12|Ta chuangzao wan lei, er yi chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen qi cheng,

43|13|yibian nimen duan zuo zai shangmian. Ranhou, zai duan zuo de shihou, xiangzhe nimen de zhu de endian, bingqie shuo:“Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu! Ta wei women zhifu ci wu, women duiyu ta ben shi wuneng.
43|14|Women biding guiyu women de zhu.”
43|15|Tamen ba ta de yibufen puren, dang zuo tamen de fenzi; ren que shi mingxian de gu en zhe.
43|16|Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de zhongsheng zhong zi qu nu'er, er yi nan'er zhuan gui nimen ma?
43|17|Tamen wangyan zhiren zhu you nu'er, dan tamen zhong de yige ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lianse bian cheng andan de, erqie ta shi ao nu de.
43|18|Zai shoushi zhong chang da, qie buneng xiongbian zhe,(nandao tamen yi ta gui an la ma?)

43|19|Zhong tianshi ben shi an la de nupu, tamen que yi zhong tianshi wei nuxing. Tamen ceng jianzheng an la chuangzao tianshi ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu xialai, tamen ye jiang bei shenwen.
43|20|Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo zhiren zhu yiyu, women shi bu hui chongbai tamen de.” Tamen duiyu ci shuo, hao wu renshi; tamen zhishi shuohuang hua.
43|21|Nandao yiqian wo ceng ci tamen yi ben tian jing, er tamen shi jianchi na ben tian jing de.
43|22|Buran, tamen shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji er de zhengdao de.”

43|23|Zai ni zhiqian, mei feng wo zheyang paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshi qu, nali de haohua zhe zong shi shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji de.”

43|24|Ta shuo:“Jishi wo xianshi nimen yi zhong bi nimen zuxian de zongjiao geng wei chongzheng de zongjiao, nimen hai yao zuncong nimen de zuxian ma?” Tamen shuo:“Women que shi buxin nimen suo feng de shiming de.”
43|25|Guwo chengfale tamen, ni kan kan fouren zhengdao zhe de jieju shi zenyang de!
43|26|Dangshi, yi bo la xin dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo chongbai de, que shi meiyou guanxi de,
43|27|wei chuangzao wo de zhu ze buran, ta biding yindao wo.”
43|28|Ta jiang zhe ju hua liu zeng ta de houyi yibian tamen huiwu.
43|29|Buran, wo shi zhexie ren he tamen de zuxian xiangshou, zhidao zhenli jianglin, ji xuanjiao de shizhe dansheng.
43|30|Zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi moshu, women biding buxin ta.”
43|31|Tamen shuo:"Zenme bu ba zhe ben “gulanjing” jiang shi liang chengzhong renhe yi cheng de yao ren ne?”

43|32|Nandao tamen neng fenpei ni de zhu de enhui ma? Wo jiang tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shengji fenpei ji tamen, wo shi tamen bici xiangcha ruogan ji, yibian tamen ceng ceng jiezhi. Ni de zhu de enhui bi tamen suo jixu de geng youmei.
43|33|Ruo bushi wei fang shiren bian wei yi jiao, wo bi shi bu xin zhiren zhu de renmen de fangwu bian cheng you yin ding de, he yin ti de, yibian tamen denglin qi shang;
43|34|bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you yin men he yin chuang de, yibian tamen yan wochuang shang;
43|35|bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you jinshi de. Zhexie wufei shi jin shi shenghuo de xiangshou; zai ni de zhu nali de houshi, shi zhuan gui jingwei zhe de.
43|36|Shei yaoshi wushi zhiren zhu de jiaohui, wo jiu rang yige emo fu zai shei de shenshang, chengwei ta de pengyou.
43|37|Naxie emo, fang'ai tamen zunxun zhengdao, er tamen que yiwei ziji shi zunxun zhengdao de.
43|38|Dai wushi zhe lai dao wo nali de shihou, ta dui ta de pengyou shuo:“Dan yuan wo he ni zhi jian, you dongxi liang fang de juli, ni zhe pengyou zhen elie!”
43|39|Nimen ceng xing bu yi, suoyi jinri zhe zhong yuanwang duiyu nimen jue wu biyi. Yinwei nimen yao tong shou xingfa.
43|40|Nandao ni neng shi longzi tingwen, huo neng yindao xiazi he zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de ren ma?
43|41|Ruguo wo shi ni qi shi, name, wo jianglai biding yao chengfa tamen;
43|42|huo wo yao zhaoshi ni wo suoyong yi jinggao tamen de xingfa, name, wo dui tamen, que shi quanneng de.
43|43|Suoyi ni yingdang jianchi ni suo shou de qishi, ni que shi zai zhengdao shang de.
43|44|“Gulanjing” que shi ni he ni de zongzu de rongyu, nimen jianglai yao bei shenwen.
43|45|Ni wen wen zai ni zhiqian suo paiqian de zhong shizhe, wo ceng fou zai zhiren zhu zhi wai zhiding xuduo shenling gong ren chongbai.
43|46|Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang, qu jiaohua falao he ta de guizumen, ta shuo:“Wo que shi zhong shijie de zhu de shizhe.”
43|47|Dang ta ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen de shihou, tamen like chaoxiao naxie jixiang.
43|48|Wo suo zhaoshi tamen de jixiang, yi jian bi yi jian da. Wo ceng yi xingfa chengzhi tamen, yibian tamen huiwu.
43|49|Tamen ceng shuo: Shushi a! Qing ni wei women qidao ni de zhu, yinwei ta ceng yu ni ding yue de yuangu, women biding yao zunxun zhengdao.
43|50|Dang wo jiechu tamen suo zao de xingfa de shihou, tamen like shuangyue.
43|51|Falao ceng hanjiao ta de baixing shuo:“Wo de baixing a! Misi er (aiji) de guo quan, he zai wo jiaoxia benliu de jianghe, bu dou shi wo de ma? Nandao nimen kan bujian?
43|52|Nandao wo bushi bi zhe beijian erqie hanhu de ren geng qiang ma?
43|53|Zenme meiyou huangjin de shouzhuo, jia zai ta de shou shang ne? Huozhe shi zhong tianshi tong ta jiezhong jianglin ne?”
43|54|Ta ceng gudong ta de baixing, tamen jiu fucong ta; tamen que shi beini zhe.
43|55|Dang tamen chufan wo de shihou, wo chengzhi tamen, gu shi tamen tongtong yan si,
43|56|wo yi tamen wei hou ren de jianjie.
43|57|Dang mai er yan de erzi bei ju wei li de shihou, ni de zongzu like xuanhua,
43|58|tamen shuo:“Women de zhong shenling geng hao ne? Haishi ta geng hao ne?” Tamen zhishi wei qiangciduoli er ju ta wei li, buran, tamen shi hao bian de minzhong.
43|59|Ta zhishi yige puren, wo ci ta de endian, bing yi ta wei yiselie houyi de shifan.
43|60|Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi she nimen er chuangzao xuduo tianshi, zai da dishang jicheng nimen.
43|61|Zhe que shi fuhuo shi de yuzhao, ni qie mo huaiyi ta, ni yingdang shuncong wo, zhe shi zhenglu.
43|62|Jue buyao rang emo fang'ai nimen, ta que shi nimen de ming di.

43|63|Dang er sa daizhe xuduo mingzheng lailin de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo que yi ba zhihui dai lai gei nimen, yibian wo wei nimen jieshi nimen suo zhenglun de yibufen lu li. Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
43|64|An la que shi wo de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu, suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai ta, zhe shi zhenglu.
43|65|Ge jiaopai de ren, bici fenzheng. Ai zai bu yi de renmen! Jianglai yao shou tongku ri de xingfa.
43|66|Tamen zhi qiwangzhe fuhuo shi buzhi bu jue de huran lailin tamen.
43|67|Zai na ri, yiban pengyou jiang huxiang choushi, wei jingwei zhe ze buran.
43|68|Wo de zhong pu a! Jinri nimen meiyou kongju, ye meiyou youchou.
43|69|Tamen ceng gui xin wo de jixiang, tamen yuan shi shunfu de.
43|70|Nimen he nimen de qizi, yukuai di jin leyuan qu ba!
43|71|Jiang you jin pan he jinbei, zai tamen zhi jian ai ci chuandi. Leyuan zhong youxin suo lianmu, yan suo xinshang de lequ, nimen jiang yong ju qizhong.
43|72|Zhe shi nimen yin ziji de shanxing er de jicheng de leyuan.
43|73|Nimen zai qizhong, jiang you xuduo shuiguo, gong nimen qu shi.
43|74|Zui renmen jianglai bi yong ju huo yu de xingfa zhong,
43|75|na xingfa bu shao jianqing, tamen jiang zai qizhong jusang.
43|76|Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, dan tamen zi qi.
43|77|Tamen jiang hanjiao shuo:“Malike a! Qing ni de zhu chujue women ba! Ta shuo:“Nimen biding yao liu zai xingfa zhong.”
43|78|Wo que yi ba zhenli zhaoshi nimen, dan nimen daban shiyanwu zhenli de.
43|79|Tamen yi jueding yi jian shile ma? Wo ye bi jueding yi jian shi.
43|80|Tamen yiwei wo ting bujian tamen de mimi he si yi ma? Buran, wo de tianshimen jiu zai tamen de genqian, jilu tamen de yanxing.
43|81|Ni shuo:“Ruguo zhiren zhu you nu'er, name, wo shi shouxian chongbai qi nu'er de.”
43|82|Zansong tiandi de zhu, baozuo de zhu, ta shi chao hu tamen de xushu de!
43|83|Ni rang tamen wang tan ba! Rang tamen xixi ba! Zhidao tamen kan dao tamen bei jinggao de rizi.
43|84|Ta zai tianshang shi ying shou chongbai de, zai dishang yeshi ying shou chongbai de; ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de.
43|85|Duo fu zai, you tiandi de guo quan he tiandi jian de wanwu zhe! Fuhuo shi de zhishi zhiyou ta zhidao, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.
43|86|Tamen she ta er qidao de, meiyou ti ren shuo qing de quanbing; wei yi zhenli er zuozheng, qie shen zhi qi zheng ci de renmen, ze buran.
43|87|Ruguo ni wen tamen, shei chuangzao tamen, tamen biding shuo:“An la.” Tamen shi ruhe beimiu ne?
43|88|Ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Zhexie ren que shi bu xindao de minzhong.
43|89|Ni yingdang yuanliang tamen, ni yingdang shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an! Tamen bujiu jiu zhidaole.”
44|1|Ha yi, mi mu.
44|2|Yi mingque de jingdian mengshi,
44|3|zai yige jixiang de yejian, wo que yi jiang shi ta, wo que shi jinggao zhe.
44|4|Zai na yeli, yiqie ruizhi de shi, dou bei panding,
44|5|na shi anzhao cong wo nali fachu de mingling de. Wo que shi paiqian shizhe de.
44|6|Na shi youyu cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.
44|7|Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhi zhu, ruguo nimen shi jianxin zhe.”
44|8|Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Ta neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si, ta shi nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.
44|9|Buran, tamen shi zai yihuo zhong de, shi youxi de.
44|10|Ni yingdang dengdai yanwu mantian de rizi,
44|11|na yanwu jiang longzhao shiren, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhong tongku de xingfa.”
44|12|Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women jiechu zhe zhong xingfa, women que shi xindao de.
44|13|Tamen zen neng juewu ne? Xianhe de shizhe, que yi lailin tamen,
44|14|er tamen que biqi ta. Tamen shuo: Ta shi shou jiao de, shi fengkuang de.
44|15|Wo biding yao zhanshi jiechu zhe zhong xingfa, nimen biding fu fan yu beini.
44|16|Wo jinxing zuida de xiji zhi ri, wo biding yao chengfa tamen.
44|17|Zai tamen zhiqian, wo que yi kaoyanle falao de baixing. You yige gaogui de shizhe lailin tamen,
44|18|shuo:“Nimen ba an la de pu renmen jiao gei wo ba! Wo que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe, fengming lai jiaohua nimen de.
44|19|Nimen buyao dui an la gao'ao. Wo biding yao zhaoshi nimen yige mingzheng.
44|20|Wo que yi qiu bi yu wo de zhu he nimen de zhu, mian zao nimen de mouhai.
44|21|Ruguo nimen bu xiangxin wo, name, nimen fangren wo ba!”
44|22|Ta jiu qidao ta de zhu shuo: Zhe deng ren, que shi fanzui de minzhong.”
44|23|(Zhu shuo): Ni daizhe wo de zhong pu zai yejian chuzou ba! Nimen biding yao bei zhuigan.
44|24|Ni rang haishui baochi pingjing, tamen biding shi bei yan si de jundui.”
44|25|Tamen ceng pao xia ruogan yuanpu he quanyuan,
44|26|zhuangjia hemei zhai,
44|27|yiji tamen suo xiangshou de fu ze!
44|28|Jieju shi zheyang de: Wo ceng shi bie de minzhong jicheng tamen,
44|29|tiandi meiyou ku tamen, tamen ye meiyou huode huanxing.
44|30|Wo que yi shi yiselie de houyi baituole lingru de xingfa
44|31|falao de xingfa. Ta que shi gao'ao de, que shi guofen de.
44|32|Wo que yi ben zhenzhi er xuanba tamen, shi tamen chao yi ge minzu,
44|33|wo shangci tamen xuduo jixiang, dou shi you mingxian de shi yan de.
44|34|Zhe deng ren biding yao shuo:
44|35|“Women zhiyou chuci de siwang, women bu hui fuhuo.
44|36|Nimen ba women de zuxian zhaohuan huilai ba, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.
44|37|Tamen shi geng gaogui de ne? Haishi tu bai de zongzu shi geng gaogui ne? Zai tamen zhiqian de xuduo minzu, wo yi jiayi huimiele; yinwei tamen que shi fanzui zhe.
44|38|Wo meiyou yi youxi de taidu chuangzao tiandi wanwu,
44|39|wo zhi ben zhenli er chuangzao zhi, dan tamen daban bu zhidao.
44|40|Zhenbie ri, que shi wei tamen quanti yuding de riqi.
44|41|Zai na ri, pengyou duiyu pengyou, hao wu biyi, tamen ye bu meng yuanzhu;
44|42|wei an la suo lianxu zhe ze buran. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
44|43|Zan hu mu de guoshi,
44|44|que shi zuiren de shipin,
44|45|xiang you jiao yang zai tamen de fu zhong feiteng,
44|46|xiang kaishui yiyang de feiteng.
44|47|(Zhu shuo):“Nimen zhuo zhu ta, ranhou, ba ta tuo ru huo yu zhong,
44|48|ranhou, zai ba feishui de xingfa qingzhu zai ta de tou shang! ”
44|49|Ni changshi ba! Ni que shi xianhe de, que shi zungui de!
44|50|Zhe (xingfa) que shi nimen shengqian suo huaiyi de.”
44|51|Jingwei zhe biding yao zhu zai anquan di difang
44|52|zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan,
44|53|chuanzhuo ling luo chouduan, xiangxiang er zuo.
44|54|Jieju shi zheyang de: Wo jiang yi baixi de, mei mudi nuzi, zuo tamen de banlu.
44|55|Tamen zai leyuan zhong, jiang anquan de suoqu ge zhong shuiguo.
44|56|Tamen zai leyuan zhong, chu chuci siwang wai bu zai chang si de ziwei. An la jiang shi tamen de mian yu huo yu de xingfa.
44|57|Na shi youyu ni de zhu de endian, na que shi weida de chenggong.
44|58|Wo yi ni de yuyan, shi “gulanjing” chengwei yi jie de, zhi wei xiwang tamen neng juewu.
44|59|Ni dengzhe ba, tamen que shi dengdaizhuo de!
45|1|Ha yi, mi mu.
45|2|Zhe ben jing shi cong zhiren zhi rui de an la jiang shi de.
45|3|Tianshang dishang, zai xindao zhe kan lai que you xuduo jixiang.
45|4|An la chuangzao nimen, bing sanbu ge zhong dongwu, zai jianxin zhe kan lai, qizhong you xuduo jixiang.
45|5|Zhouye de lunliu, an la cong yun zhong jiangxia jiyang, jiu jie ta er shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, yiji gaibian fengxiang; zai neng liaojie de ren kan lai, qizhong you xuduo jixiang.
45|6|Zhexie shi an la de jixiang, wo ben zhenli er dui ni xushu ta. Zai an la de xun ci he jixiang zhihou, tamen hai yao xin shenme xun ci ne?
45|7|Ai zai mei ge wangyan de duo zui zhe!
45|8|Ta tingjian bieren dui ta xuandu an la de jixiang shi, bian zi da er guzhi, haoxiang meiyou tingjian shi de, suoyi ni yingdang yi tongku de xingfa xiang ta baoxi.
45|9|Dang ta zhidao wo de yidian jixiang de shihou, jiu ba ta dang zuo xiaobing. Zhe deng ren jiang shou lingru de xingfa.
45|10|Tamen de shenhou you huo yu, tamen suo huode de, duiyu tamen, hao wu biyi; tamen she an la er renwei baohu shen de, duiyu tamen, ye hao wu biyi; tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
45|11|Zhe shi zhengdao, buxin qi zhu de jixiang zhe jiang shou tongku de jixing.
45|12|An la wei nimen er zhifu haiyang, yibian chuanbo feng ta de mingling er hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie.
45|13|Ta wei nimen er zhifu tiandi wanwu, duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang.
45|14|Ni dui xindao zhemen shuo, yao she you naxie bu xiwang jian dao an la de renmen, yibian an la yin tamen de xingwei lai fu chou tamen.
45|15|Xingshan zhe zi shou qi yi, zuo'e zhe zi shou qi hai. Ranhou, nimen yao bei zhao guiyu nimen de zhu.
45|16|Wo que yi ba tian jing, zhihui, yuyan, shangci yiselie de houyi, bing yi jiamei de shipin gongji tamen, qie shi tamen chao yi ge minzu.
45|17|Wo ceng zhaoshi tamen guanyu ci shi de xuduo mingzheng, tamen zai zhishi jianglin tamen zhihou, cai yin huxiang jidu er zhenglun. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu biding panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei.
45|18|Ranhou, wo shi ni zunxun guanyu ci shi de jiao fa. Ni yingdang zunshou na changdao, buyao shuncong wu zhi zhe de siyu.
45|19|Tamen biding buneng wei ni diyu an la de xingfa yi sihao. Bu yi zhe biding huxiang jianhu; an la shi jianhu jingwei zhe de.
45|20|Zhe shi shiren de mingzheng, yeshi dui jianxin de minzhong de yindao he enhui.
45|21|Nandao zuo'e zhe yiwei wo hui shi tamen he xindao erqie xingshan zhe yiyang, er shi tamen de shengsi xiangdeng ma? Tamen de panduan zhen elie!
45|22|An la ben zhenli er chuangzao tiandi, yibian mei geren dou yin qi xingwei er shou baochou, tamen jianglai bu shou kui wang.

45|23|Ni gaosu wo ba! Yi siyu wei zhuzai de ren, an la shi ta mingzhi gu wei de mi wu, bing fengbi ta de er he xin, zai ta de yan shang jia yi mo; an la shi ta mi wu zhihou, shei hai neng yindao ta ne? Nandao nimen bu juewu ma?
45|24|Tamen shuo:“Zhiyou women de jinshi shenghuo, women si de si, sheng de sheng, zhiyou guangyin neng shi women xiaomie. Tamen duiyu na shi, yi wu suo zhi, tamen zhuan shi caice.
45|25|Youren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, tamen zhishi jiekou shuo:“Nimen ba women de zuxian zhaohuan huilai ba, ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de. ”
45|26|Ni shuo: An la shi nimen sheng, ranhou shi nimen si, ranhou zai hao wuyi yi de fuhuo ri jihe nimen; dan shiren daban bu zhidao. ”
45|27|Tiandi de guo quan, gui an la suoyou. Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, fandui zhenli zhe jiang shou kui she.
45|28|Ni jianglai hui kanjian, mei yi minzu dou shi quxi de, mei yi minzu dou yao bei zhao qu kan ziji de gongguo bu. Jinri, nimen jiang shou ziji xingwei de baochou.”
45|29|Zhe shi wo li de gongguo bu, ta dui nimen binggong zuozheng. Wo que yi xialing jilu nimen de xingwei.
45|30|Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, tamen de zhuyao shi tamen ru yu ta de enhui zhong, na que shi mingxian de chenggong.
45|31|Zhiyu buxindao zhe,(wo shuo):“Nandao meiyouren dui nimen xuanduguo wo de jixiang ma? Dan nimen zi da, nimen yuan shi fanzui de minzhong.”

45|32|Youren shuo:“An la de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de; fuhuo shi shi hao wuyi yi de.” Nimen jiu shuo:“Women bu zhidao fuhuo shi shi shenme, women zhi caixiang na huoxu shi yao fasheng de, dan women bing bu quexin.”
45|33|Tamen suozuo de zui'e, jianglai yao dui tamen xianxian; tamen suo chaoxiao de xingfa, jianglai yao lailin tamen.
45|34|Huozhe jiang dui tamen shuo:“Jinri wo hushi nimen, ru nimen yiqian hushi jinri de xiang hui yiyang. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, nimen jue meiyou yuanzhu zhe.
45|35|Na shi youyu nimen ba an la de jixiang dang zuo xiaobing, chenshi de shenghuo qipianle nimen de yuangu.” Jinri tamen bu bei fangchu huo yu, ye bude yao en.
45|36|Yiqie zansong, zhi gui an la——zhu tian de zhu, dadi de zhu, zhong shijie de zhu!
45|37|Tiandi jian de weida, zhi shuyu ta; ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de.
